OrgName.entry: ASSIST (SHEFFIELD), ASYLUM SEEKER SUPPORT INITIATIVE, SHORT TERM

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides support to destitute asylum seekers who are denied any benefits, housing or health care. Also provides emergency accommodation and friendship. Requests for help may be made through the Council Drop-in at Victoria Hall on Wednesdays 2-4pm and through agencies such as Pitsmoor CAB, Asylum Health Team, the Conversation Club, but not direct to ASSIST.

Langs.entry: Amharic, Arabic, Farsi, French, Kurdish, Russian, Tigrinya, Turkish
